name: Combobox
purpose: Allow the user to search, filter, and select from a potentially large or dynamic set of options.
useWhen: User needs to type to find an option
Chips or tags are needed to display selections
rules: User input drives filtering or discovery
Options update as the user types
May support single or multiple selection
doNotUseWhen: Options are few and easily recognizable
Simple selection without search is sufficient
A closed, static list is preferred
aiHints: Use Combobox when discovery matters more than recognition
Do not default to Combobox for simple selects
Combobox implies higher interaction cost than Select
